it.polimi.constraints.reachability

Class ReachabilityRelation

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.constraints.reachability.ReachabilityRelation

  • public class ReachabilityRelation
extends Object
    contains the reachability relation. The reachability relation specified whether an incoming port of a sub-property is reachable from the outgoing port of the same transition
    Author:
    Claudio Menghi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReachabilityRelation()
      creates a new empty reachability relation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReachabilityRelation

        public ReachabilityRelation()
        creates a new empty reachability relation. The reachability relation is used to map the incoming transitions which are reachable from the outgoing transition of the same component

    • Method Detail

      • addTransition

        public void addTransition(LabeledPluggingTransition outgoingTransition,
                          LabeledPluggingTransition incomingTransition,
                          Boolean modelAccepting,
                          Boolean claimAccepting)
        adds the transition to the reachability relation. The sourceTransition is the outgoingPort of the sub-property from which the destinationTransition can be reached. The destinationTransition is the incoming port of the subproperty which is reachable from the sourceTransition
        Parameters:
        outgoingTransition - the outgoing transition to be considered
        incomingTransition - the incoming transition to be considered
        modelAccepting - true if an accepting state of the model is present from the outgoing to the incoming transition
        claimAccepting - true if an accepting state of the claim is present from the outgoint to the incoming transition
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if one of the two transitions is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the incoming or the outgoing transition is not incoming/outgoing

      • getReachabilityAcceptingMap

        public com.google.common.collect.Multimap<State,ReachabilityEntry> getReachabilityAcceptingMap()
        returns the map that associates for each state the corresponding reachability entries
        Returns:
        the map that associates for each state the corresponding reachability entries

      • get

        public Collection<ReachabilityEntry> get(State subPropertyState)
        returns the collection of reachability entries associated to one state
        Parameters:
        subPropertyState - the state of the sub-property to be considered
        Returns:
        the set of the reachability entries whose source is the specified property state

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
